result.eng: They violated the Official Languages Act.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla
result.orig: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla
result.html: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha OifigiúlaThey violated the Official Languages Act.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad Aċt na dTeangaċa OifigiúlaThey violated the Official Languages Act.

result.eng: He was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ga: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua
result.orig: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua
result.html: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ponchtml: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus ẛáraiġ sé gaċ duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.

result.eng: It was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ga: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.orig: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlí
result.html: Ba léir gur sháraigh siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir gur ẛáraiġ siad an dlíIt was obvious that they had broken the law.

result.eng: The court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ga: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.orig: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreacht
result.html: Chinn an chúirt gur sháraigh an t-acht an bunreachtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.
result.ponchtml: Ċinn an ċúirt gur ẛáraiġ an t-aċt an bunreaċtThe court decided that the act breached the constitution.

result.html: Sháraigh an trádalaí an dlíThe trader broke the law.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ an trádalaí an dlíThe trader broke the law.

result.html: Sháraigh said gach constaicThey overcame every obstacle.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ said gaċ constaicThey overcame every obstacle.

result.eng: They overcame the other team easily.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héasca
result.orig: Sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héasca
result.html: Sháraigh siad an fhoireann eile go héascaThey overcame the other team easily.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad an ḟoireann eile go héascaThey overcame the other team easily.

result.eng: They overcame the limitations of time and space.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad laincisí an ama agus an spáis
result.orig: Sháraigh siad laincisí an ama agus an spáis
result.html: Sháraigh siad laincisí an ama agus an spáisThey overcame the limitations of time and space.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad laincisí an ama agus an spáisThey overcame the limitations of time and space.

result.html: Sháraigh sé an churiarracht dhomhandaHe broke the world record.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé an ċuriarraċt ḋoṁandaHe broke the world record.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada

result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
